# Opportunity Template
## Installation
```bash
# Git Clone
git clone git@github.com:Stakedllc/opportunity-template.git

# Change Directory
cd opportunity-template

# Install node project dependencies
npm i
```

#### Scripts (see: package.json)
```bash
npm run accounts
npm run compile
npm run test
npm run node
npm run scripts:sample
npm run help
```
